Title: TICKET: Glimmerogg Games
Description:
<Written in sloppy handwriting that makes it almost impossible to read.>

CONGRATULATIONS, LOAMM VISITOR! YOU'VE FOUND A TICKET TO THE BEST COMPETITION IN ZARALEK CAVERN: THE GLIMMEROGG GAMES!

You'll find the games in the south of Zaralek Cavern. Just look for a bunch of happy drogbar! Don't miss our fun activities like...

<The rest of the page is illegible except for the name "Brogg.">
ObjectivesText: Pay a visit to Glimmerogg in the south of Zaralek Cavern.
